segments.text: What do you think about half day kindergarten for Stacey ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We could try it for the first few weeks and see if she likes it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just think it will be a little difficult for her to be away from home for so long right off the bat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have a good point . She hasn't really ever been away from home for longer than a few hours .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think she is really going to like her teacher though .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , they seemed to click at the meeting the other day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you happen to notice if she was interested in any of the other kids ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , but I did notice that she was very interested in the art supplies !
segments.speaker: S2
